channel.title: 317 Cursor Help
channel.description:
Well i've just noticed when i click on something my cursor click is not right so when i click its half way down my mouse if you understand ( not very good at describing these things:'-) ) does anyone have a fix for this?
Hope someone can help!
Barrowss
:D
